Parameters

type Type

TestDecimalPrecision()

This test exercises that when sitting a decimal Precision like 0.1 on a BindableNumber<float>, the resulting Value is the closest to the actual closest float number to the real-world decimal. This matters because certain methods of rounding to the precision specified on the BindableNumber<T> cause rounding errors that show up elsewhere in undesirable ways.

[Test]
public void TestDecimalPrecision()

public void TestSetValue(Type type)

TestValueChangeEventOccursAfterPrecisionChangeEvent()
